title: ALL notification dots not showing. Phone not in Do Not Disturb Mode.
content:
Notification dot setting is on. Do not disturb is off. No dots showing for ANY app. They were last week!
Tried a soft reset. Tried safe mode. Ensured software up to date.
Still no notification dots.
Surely this has a simple fix? I have been through all the threads and apart from turning off DND setting, there is no other solution posted...
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
